channel.title: How do I remove the wildy sign in the bottom right hand side of screen?
channel.description:
Hi all,
On my server, I have a wildy sign, that is there even if you are not in the wildy, it is really annoying.
I have tried but I can't remove it.
Does anyone no how to remove it?
Thanks.
Musicmad

item.title: How do I remove the wildy sign in the bottom right hand side of screen?

@_8ballcrazy wrote:

oops i thought he said move not remove sorry

item.title: How do I remove the wildy sign in the bottom right hand side of screen?
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

i will give you one that makes it safe/wildy

public boolean inSafezone() { // by 
if(((absX >= 2888 && absX <= 2934 && absY >= 9671 && absY <=9698) || absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) ||
heightLevel == 1)
return true;
else				
return false;			
}

then this :

if (inSafezone()){ outStream.createFrame(208); // woot new pk server by outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197); sendQuest("@gre@Safe", 199); } else { outStream.createFrame(208); // woot new pk server by outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197); sendQuest("@red@Wild", 199); } }

this must work
~supra
